H0.text: In which European country is the HQ of the food company, Nestle . France

H3.text: In which European country is the HQ of the food company, Nestle . Suiza

A4.text: Nestlé is headquartered in Vevey, Switzerland.

A5.text: Switzerland is home to several large multinational corporations. The largest by revenue are Glencore, Gunvor, Nestlé, Mediterranean Shipping Company, Novartis, Hoffmann-La Roche, ABB, Mercuria Energy Group and Adecco.
